alert.note: Alert for Bell; Comanche; Lampasas; Leon; Milam; Mills; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 6:00AM CST until February 27 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts between 35 and 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Comanche, Mills, Lampasas, Bell, Leon, Milam and Robertson Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 2 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Unsecured outdoor items may be blown around in the wind. Driving on area roadways may become difficult, especially for high-profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet roads may become slick this morning with the fog. Watch for dangerous crosswinds by evening on west to east oriented roads and highways.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of at least 20 to 30 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Boaters should use extra caution when venturing onto area lakes. Residents may wish to take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other lightweight outdoor objects that may be blown around in the strong winds.

area.areaDesc: Bell; Comanche; Lampasas; Leon; Milam; Mills; Robertson
